faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Short answers to most common questions. For your case — write to me.

items.a: No one can guarantee approval. I maximize your chances by aligning your case with official requirements and common consulate practice.

items.q: Can you submit documents for me?
items.a: I advise and prepare you. Submission and biometrics are done by you or an authorized visa center per local rules.

items.q: Do you work only with Russians?
items.a: I primarily help Russian citizens, but I can advise other CIS nationals on request.
Send a short description of your route and dates on Telegram. I’ll offer a slot and a fixed‑price quote.

contact.title: Write to me
contact.subtitle: Tell me your route and timing — I’ll suggest options and the next steps.
contact.directText: The fastest way is Telegram. Email works too.
contact.noteText: Visa rules change frequently. I work with official sources and share links so you can verify everything yourself.

intro.p: This policy explains how KEYVISA processes personal data in the course of visa consulting. We comply with applicable laws, including Federal Law No. 152‑FZ on Personal Data and, where relevant, the GDPR.

controller.p: Controller: KEYVISA (sole proprietor). Contact: hello@keyvisa.co. Purpose: visa consulting and related communications.

data.p: Identification data (name, date of birth, passport details), contact data (email, Telegram), travel plans, supporting documents (invitations, certificates), and technical data (IP, device). You should not send data we do not request.

use.p: Consulting on visa options, preparing checklists, assessing risks, invoicing, preventing abuse, and fulfilling legal obligations.

basis.p: Consent; performance of a contract or pre‑contractual steps at your request; compliance with legal obligations; and our legitimate interests (service quality and security).

retention.p: We keep data only as long as necessary for the stated purposes or as required by law. You may request deletion when retention is no longer necessary.

security.p: We apply organizational and technical measures appropriate to the risk, including access controls and encryption where possible.

transfer.p: If we transfer data across borders, we rely on your consent and ensure suitable safeguards. We avoid unnecessary sharing and use reputable services.

rights.p: Access, rectify, erase, restrict, object, and withdraw consent. To exercise rights, email hello@keyvisa.co. We may need to verify your identity.

scope.p: KEYVISA provides visa consulting: guidance, checklists, document review, and preparation for submissions and interviews. We do not represent you before authorities unless expressly agreed in writing.

notLegal.p: Decisions are made by consulates and visa centers. We provide best‑effort consulting based on official sources; no outcome can be guaranteed.

clientDuties.p: You provide accurate and complete information and submit documents within deadlines. You are responsible for appointments, biometrics, and travel decisions.

fees.p: Prices are communicated upfront. Government fees and visa center charges are separate and paid by you.

cancellations.p: Sessions may be rescheduled by mutual agreement. Refunds follow our written policy shared before payment.

liability.p: To the maximum extent permitted by law, we are not liable for indirect damages or decisions by authorities.

ip.p: Checklists and materials are for your personal use. Do not redistribute without permission.

privacyRef.p: Processing of personal data is described in our Privacy Policy.

governingLaw.p: These Terms are governed by applicable law at our place of business. Disputes are resolved in that jurisdiction.

contact.p: For questions about these Terms: hello@keyvisa.co.
